description: This file defines a Python class 'LiteLLM' for interacting with the LiteLLM SDK, including methods for message formatting, API request handling, and response parsing within a language model interface.

classes.name: LiteLLM
classes.description: A class for interacting with LiteLLM Python SDK, providing methods for message formatting, API invocation, and response parsing.

methods.name: __post_init__
methods.description: Initializes the LiteLLM instance, setting API keys and validating environment.

methods.name: get_client
methods.description: Returns the LiteLLM client instance, initializing it if necessary.

methods.name: _format_messages
methods.description: Formats a list of Message objects into the structure expected by LiteLLM API.

methods.name: get_request_params
methods.description: Constructs and returns the request parameters for API calls, including optional tools.

methods.name: invoke
methods.description: Sends a chat completion request to LiteLLM API with provided messages and options.

methods.name: invoke_stream
methods.description: Sends a streaming chat completion request to LiteLLM API.

methods.name: ainvoke
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a chat completion request to LiteLLM API.

methods.name: ainvoke_stream
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a streaming chat request to LiteLLM API.

methods.name: parse_provider_response
methods.description: Parses the response from LiteLLM API into a ModelResponse object.

methods.name: parse_provider_response_delta
methods.description: Parses streaming response delta from LiteLLM API into a ModelResponse object.

methods.name: parse_tool_calls
methods.description: Builds structured tool call data from streamed tool call information.
